question: You are going to arrange a special party at your home next week. You want to invite a local artist who is a playback singer. Write a letter to him. In your letter explain the occasion to him , invite him to the party, tell him why you wnat him to perform.
text: I am writing this letter to invite you to the retirement ceremony of my father who is going to retire from his service by the end of next week on the 31st of July.

As mentioned above that day is very special for my parents and I really want to make it memorable for them yet I am a bit worried about the management of your schedule. So, I thought to arrange a special party at my residence located in Ambala City and want you to perform live during the event.

My father is among big fans of yours. I wish to surprise him with the performance of his favourite singer during the occasion. Therefore, I am inviting you to join the celebrations and at the same time make it more enjoyable with your melodious voice.
Feel free to call me on 7421252432 for any further details I am hoping to get your positive response on this matter.
